Asai kanave athisaya nilave kadhal ulagam  kAna vA
p.d. n.s s  rg  s r  r g g  gp p   pp Sdpm g s  sgrpg

thanga maname singa kuname kanni thamizhai paruga vA
p   m2 p S dp m  g  m d p  gr r  r  m2m2p  g r s  s

koodal nagaril vaigai manalil kooda vEndum odi    vA
g  m   p d d   d  p   m m g   g  m  pn n   SndnSn S


konjum kavithai nenjil inikka pAda vEndum pAdi   vA
g  m   p d d    d  p   mpm g  g m  pn n   SndnSn S

entha ulagam inba ulagam angu paranthe   pogalAm
n RS  Sd dp  p S  dm mr  r r1 r p  pm2dp grs s d.

angu paranthe   pogalAm
d.d. d.r  rgpmg r s s

Stanza 1:
A...        azhage konjum azhage intha azhagendrum enthan sontham
m2pm2pSdmgp m2p p  pS d   mg  p  g m   md  d   d   dnSd   pmg p

A... aruge konjam aruge vanthu anai endru kenjum nenjam
sgm2 m2pp  pS d   mg p  g  m   md   d  d  dnSn   dndp p

A...  rathiye - deva   rathiye kAma rasam poosum kangal pArthEn
pm2gs m2p  p    m2pSd  m g  p  g m  m d   d  d   dnSd   pmg p

nathiyil - kAthal nathiyil ennai neer'rAtta unnai kEttEn
m2p  p     pgs    m2p  p   g m   md   d  d  dnSn  dndp p

ich-ich endru mutham sugam achik indra satham
g   p   p  d  m m    m g   rm    m  p  p g

sithi kattum inbam athil thithikkattum nenjam
g p   p  d   pm m  m g   r  m   m  p   p  g

mothathil- muthangal nitham nitham sinthalAm
g p  mg    r m   gr  s r    r g    r  s  n.d.

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
A...varuvAi pakkam varuvAi endrum neethAne- enthan varuvAi
A.... tharuvAi inbam tharuvAi karai ithuthAne mella tharuvAi
A... inithAi mElum inithAi ennai thAlattum neeyum - ini-thAi
panivAi nenjam panivAi mutham thara-thAne kovai paduvAi
vAzhil seitha kannA vadivelu seitha pennA
vAzhum undu kannil vadivellum undu kanne
yengenge- yengenge sorgam angu santhippom
